  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 itemprop="name" class="text-center medium-text-left">Gucci Bloom Gucci <small style='white-space: nowrap'>for women</small></h1></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6 text-center"><div class="grid-x"><div class="cell small-12"><img itemprop="image" width="375" height="500" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/375x500.44894.jpg" alt="Gucci Bloom Gucci for women"/></div></div></div><div class="cell small-6 text-center"><p itemprop="brand" itemtype="http://schema.org/Brand" itemscope style="margin: 0 0 1rem 0;"><a itemprop="url" href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Gucci.html"><span class="vote-button-name" style="color: #0a0a0a;" itemprop="name">Gucci</span><br><img class="brand-logo" itemprop="logo" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/dizajneri/m.67.jpg"/></a></p><h6>main accords</h6><div class="grid-x"><div class="cell accord-box"><div class="accord-bar" style="color: #000000;background: #edf2fb;opacity: 100%;width: 100%;">white floral</div></div><div class="cell accord-box"><div class="accord-bar" style="color: #000000;background: #ebfaf3;opacity: 73.838164429954%;width: 69.477858501613%;">tuberose</div></div></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y" style="margin-bottom: 1rem;" id="rating"><div class="cell small-12 medium-6"><relation-rating :perfume_id="44894" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></relation-rating></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12 medium-6 text-center"><p><a href="/goto.php?id=325720&amp;linktype=perfume_products&amp;sid=ultratop" target="_blank" style="color:#0000FF;text-decoration:underline;" >Gucci Ladies Gucci Bloom EDP Spray 1... <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="44894" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="44894" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.75</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="8481">8,481</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="800"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Gucci Bloom</b> by <b>Gucci</b> is a Floral fragrance for women. <b>Gucci Bloom</b> was launched in 2017. The nose behind this fragrance is Alberto Morillas. Top note is Jasmine; middle note is Tuberose; base note is Rangoon Creeper. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Gucci Bloom: Debuting the First Fragrance by Alessandro Michele: “I wanted a green fragrance, a courageous scent that transports you to a vastgarden filled with many flowers and plants, a bouquet of abundance. The garden is as beautiful as women are; colorful, wild, diverse, where there is everything. GucciBloom smells of this garden in order to travel to a place that is not there,” Alessandro Michele.</p>

<p>Flowering from the authentic spirit of the women Alessandro Michele champions is an attitude of freedom to be who you want to be. Mixed with the color, decoration and pattern of the creative director’s design canon, the women he dresses are flourishing in a natural, expressive and individual way: they are in bloom.</p>

<p>The first Gucci fragrance developed wholly under Alessandro Michele’s creative vision encapsulates this modern philosophy that is the guiding vision for the House.<br />
Gucci Bloom celebrates the authenticity, vitality and diversity of the women he designs for, and those that identify themselves in his vision.</p>

<p>True to who they are, these young women experience life and its fruits, blooming into their real selves. They convey their personal point-of-view without conventional limitations. They live for memorable experiences, to create stories and connect and be inspired by the objects, culture and art they choose to be surrounded by. Architect of every element of the scent, Alessandro Michele has infused Gucci Bloom’s idea of lushness, life and vigor in each fragrant note, the dreamy campaign and its unconventional design.<br />
 <br />
ABOUT THE SCENT:  Blended by master perfumer Alberto Morillas with direction from Alessandro Michele, the fragrance is created to unfold like its name. The creative director envisioned the scent as a thriving garden full of diverse types of flowers and the rich perfume it emits.<br />
 <br />
Authenticity is woven through qualitative, highly-concentrated natural ingredients.<br />
Notes blossom out like a concentration of flowers, the unique expression of the new to the world ingredients, brings a new olfactory experience. Natural Tuberose absolute harvested from India is interlaced with natural Jasmine absolute. Jasmine bud extract, obtained through an exclusive method of co-extraction that blends a natural quality of jasmine and captive moleculesto impart a fresh green and petal scent on the skin. Gucci Bloom also features notes of another plant used in perfume-making for the first time, the Rangoon Creeper. Discovered in South India, the Rangoon Creeper embodies the new scent’s concept and name, as it changes color from white, gradually darkens to pink then finally to red when it blooms. The vine’s flowers are redolent with a slightly powdery feminine floral perfume.</p>

<p>ABOUT THE DESIGN:  An arbiter and seeker of beauty, Alessandro Michele ideated a flacon and packaging that encapsulates the fragrance’s spirit dedicated to the diversity of women.<br />
 <br />
“The bottle is not designed feminine to seduce men, but to keep company with the women who wear the perfume. Retro and tender because of its color, with clean, slender lines, and not crafted in transparent glass but in porcelain, a material that I love very much,” he said.<br />
 <br />
A vintage powder pink shades the lacquered porcelain square-shaped bottle, appliquéd with the Gucci label ribbed and framed in black. The outer carton is covered inside and outside in Herbarium, a red-and-white toile de Jouy House print of leaves, cherry branches and flowers framed in black.<br />
 </p>

<p>ABOUT CAMPAIGN:  Encapsulating the very meaning of Gucci Bloom, the campaign’s idea is revealed through the contemporary women of Gucci: actress Dakota Johnson, actress and model Hari Nef and artist Petra Collins. Friends of Alessandro Michele, they have a special connection with the House, their talent resonating with Gucci’s new vision. Their diverse individual beauty is shot by Glen Luchford, allowing them to radiate in the campaign’s transformative setting. They wear Gucci Bloom during their day in the city, and it changes the surrounding urbanity into an imaginary stroll in a fantastical English garden. Tea on a sidewalk flourishing with blooms, walking in an apartment overgrown with verdant plants, and swimming at dusk in a lake entangled with shimmering flowers and reeds.     <br />
 <br />
Dancing, strolling, rejoicing in being free and full of life: this trio embody Gucci’s new vitality and the captivating, transporting nature of Gucci Bloom.<br />
 </p>

<p>The fragrance will be available as a 30, 50 and 100 ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="44894"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.14.jpg" style="width: 4.925rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Jasmine-14.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Jasmine</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.25.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tuberose-25.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tuberose</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.819.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Rangoon-Creeper-819.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Rangoon Creeper</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="44894"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='25207c3025f120ca18e3a8825bc5ba95943' slotpayload='{"ct":"XXZwMgQ+IfNzF\/LBeDnTJlWcX0\/5FWhmrAQbn4YysKM4mGf\/5UMNNamvAm+HqPt4y6Z0p33UVqXWKEO0QNK7UIF8FwvCdKIXYJe1+rh7oMJ8l5PZdZoril+1cJo56f8fvmFU\/c1TtGyVz9i8nyTbZOmx0bVsA3ET6muwll6HZD+XM7kqzGETS6g1PV2O9r9xT\/zMtY5vTVury2k\/Gixv\/IfAYTOo9z2gEEKfVl6PnOwALYzm0L9yD0ClzUVzEQJYFCFGMS\/l2dAM+DCuMRupT8mWgO4cAyHI48A05rS2oJE=","iv":"44049477fb136dd5c053eabdfa44bf5b","s":"687782eea81b53c1"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

<div class="newslist cell small-12 large-6">
    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/17352/news.17352-120x120.jpg" alt="Gucci Gorgeous Jasmine: White Floral Milkshake With a Hint of Crunch" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/Gucci-Gorgeous-Jasmine-White-Floral-Milkshake-With-a-Hint-of-Crunch-17352.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Gucci Gorgeous Jasmine: White Floral Milkshake With a Hint of Crunch</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Eddie Bulliqi</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            11/17/22 16:39
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">21</span>
</div>
</div><more-related-news load_more_title="Load more" :perfume_id="44894" :count_news="52" :previous_loaded="10"></more-related-news></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="44894"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>3.19</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="44894"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.32</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem;     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2353972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2006183">Marina1111</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1732019171" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Soft, clean, white floral</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2353972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2353972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351174" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lalapope"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2306768"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lalapope" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2306768">lalapope</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 13:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a solid unisex white floral for people who want something straight forward to put on for any situation.<br />
<br />
It's not a statement in the slightest, but that's sometimes what you need.<br />
<br />
Yes, it's quite a unapologetic green tuberose. However, as an enjoyer of Cacharel's Eden ,but often sad how it always feels slightly too much, I appreciate  how this one soothes into something more subtle in time.<br />
<br />
I think this is a perfume you can't enjoy if you don't enjoy;<br />
<br />
1) Simple scents<br />
<br />
2) White florals with no sweetness<br />
<br />
I'd also say this perfume will absolutely smother you if you over spray.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2351174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2351174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347872" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A crisp fresh super white floral scent. The best floral perfume</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2347238"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2347238#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345284" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mollenon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2294864"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2294864.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mollenon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rituals/Rituals-of-Sakura-52635.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52635.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rituals of Sakura"title="Rituals of Sakura"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345284ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345284" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2294864">Mollenon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 08:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Straightforward tuberose for 8 hours. Generic, like other reviews mention. I have an ick against tuberose; it's more yellow-flower-smelling. The Rangoon Creeper is very green and smells bitter at times, almost like an underlying body odor. It doesn't smell bad as a "pass-by scent" but smelling it up close isn't nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2345284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2345284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

This one was so generic, pleasant but boring. Tuberose, vaguely floral bb&amp;w gingham. Gorgeous gardenia blows this away.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2344779"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2344779#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335442" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335442" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sacralogica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2306542"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2306542.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sacralogica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335442ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335442" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2306542">sacralogica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 06:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>rangoon creeper is SO STRONG in a way that you're lying in a field, dreamy in your own world. Much green here - dominant very much at the beginning, but beautiful combination with jasmine and tuberose but seems like more flowers are combined (guess that's because of rangoon creeper). Nice scent non the less, and makes it possible to have a romantic day to day perfume. Smells soft and delicious. A tad too expensive though, but worth the femininity, clean and not overpowering, easily can be a classic</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2335442"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2335442#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2334537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It’s simple, bright and clean, and smells the same from spray to dry down. My only problem is that it doesn’t last more than a few hours before you need to reapply.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2334537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2334537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2333781" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mashail1974"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2175922"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2175922.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mashail1974" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2333781ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2333781" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2175922">Mashail1974</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-31">10/31/24 13:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The perfume is saturated with the scent of jasmine</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331236" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="banksias-interlude"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1965358"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1965358.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="banksias-interlude" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331236ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331236" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1965358">banksias-interlude</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 06:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love, love, love.. and then it dries down. Dry down on my skin after about 20 minutes is quite unpleasant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2331236"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2331236#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317663" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317663" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MikoWhiffs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185991"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1185991.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MikoWhiffs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317663ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317663" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1185991">MikoWhiffs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 10:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The longevity and performance are decent. I used to really enjoy this fragrance when I was starting my perfume collection, but I’ve moved away from white florals and floral scents—unless they’re paired with gourmand notes. It’s not a bad fragrance, but it feels boring to me now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2317663"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2317663#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309491" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309491" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Missm7393"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2075138"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Missm7393" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elizabeth-Arden/Green-Tea-83.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Green Tea"title="Green Tea"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309491ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309491" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2075138">Missm7393</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 20:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a classic pure white floral, heavy on the jasmine and tuberose. It is a beautifully balanced scent, it leans more to a true floral and does not have any real sweetness to it. It is definitely a more stereotypically mature scent, but don't let that deter you as it is a beautiful one. It has extremely good longevity (12+ hours) and a moderate sillage.<br />
My only advice is if possible, do a wear test before purchase. When I smell this from the bottle, it is a true white floral scent, however on my skin it is much much more green, and I don't like it as much. So I would recommend testing to see how it reacts on your skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2309491"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2309491#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306547" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It’s classic. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2305307" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="roseekilljoy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2158240.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="roseekilljoy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Flora-Gorgeous-Jasmine-75190.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75190.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Flora Gorgeous Jasmine"title="Flora Gorgeous Jasmine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2305307ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2305307" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2158240">roseekilljoy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 20:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm not a perfume snob so for me this is super nice! I really love white florals and somehow I rly like the crispiness of it! I have a sample of this and a decant of the gorgeous Jazmine and this one is more fresh and lively! It made me feel clean and in a good mood! So I give it points to that! Sometimes I don't want to smell that creamy so I'd like to have a bottle of this!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2305307"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2305307#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Picked up a travel roller at Sephora a couple months later, and ugh I hate it so much now?? It smells shallow, like it needs grounding almost. Same thing happened with a Miss Dior sample, absolute love turned to ... ugh. Going to let it macerate for another couple years and cross my fingers it turns into whatever gorgeous concoction I got to try the first time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Heady jasmin and opulent tuberose. The world was missing such a scent in mainstream. Performs well in summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2276653"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2276653#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274181" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Gucci Bloom is my first perfume ever. I blind bought this cause of the fancy elegant bottle and a FOMO as it was pushed over internet by that time. And after almost 7 years, it’s still like new 😂😂😂 touched few times only to spray for fun, not on my body 🥹 not scent makes you gag, but scent makes you think about your great-grandmother. 😐😐😐</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2272451" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Earthtoerykah"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2241437"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Earthtoerykah" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2272451ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2272451" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2241437">Earthtoerykah</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-05">09/05/24 08:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I impulse bought this perfume in 2018 on the way home from Ghana in the duty-free shop. It was my birthday, I wanted to treat myself. I am not sure if I actually even smelled this one completely before deciding to buy, I think my 18 year old self just saw the fancy display and the Gucci label and I was like lets gooooo. I tried it when I got home and I was like no seriously wtf was this and why did I waste my money on it. I think this scent actually turned me away from perfumes for a few years after that. I do not want to say that this smells like a grandma because I love the way that my grandparents smell. But it probably smells like someone else's grandma. As much as I would love to walk up to Gucci himself and get my 100 dollars back, I am happy that I am left with 2 major teaching from Gucci Bloom: 1. I cannot do heavy florals 2. Sample, sample, sample. No impulse purchases.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2272451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2272451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2270255" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2266850" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nordlanderin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961131"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1961131.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nordlanderin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2266850ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2266850" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1961131">nordlanderin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 06:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like deodorant. I choke on it. This comes from someone who loves white flowers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2266850"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2266850#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2263761" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A nice musky white floral with some natural sweetness. Since I am a floral girl, I needed to get this although I already own Do Son.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2263761"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2263761#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1781740">Lizhaugen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-05">08/05/24 07:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really pretty, and leaves a beautiful trail.  Something about this scent just makes me happy.  It smells, clean, grown, and sexy without being overpowering.  It is not a warm fragrance, it is definitely cool, I get a lot of compliments on this one.  I also appreciate that the tuberose is not a bubblegum tuberose, it's soft, and sexy. Great for the 30+ crowd, while not being too mature.  It's the sexier, more complex sister of Calvin Klein Beauty, which is my opinion smells like Daphne flower.  :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2239459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2239459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238104" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Tuberose is very dominant. I like it's minimalistic scent and that it's not mixed with ambery notes like many other perfumes. The bottle looks like a shampoo bottle, haha, but overall it's a good fragrance.<br />
7/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2238104"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2238104#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2234040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2234040" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Datura-Darling"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565614"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1565614.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Datura-Darling" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2234040ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2234040" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1565614">Datura-Darling</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-30">07/30/24 15:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A nicely done clean and green tuberose, with a backing of jasmine and what smells like honeysuckle. This is a really linear perfume and very much an inoffensive and balanced white floral. Whilst it's nothing ground breaking and it doesn't evolve much, it's a pleasant and easy to wear perfume that I think would suit many occasions. <br />
I already own many spectacular white florals, and I think Diptyque's Doson nails realistic tuberose, so not sure I'd purchase a full bottle of this one. Something in Bloom, in the dry down on my skin, did get a little bit sharp and screechy when sampling this one in the warm weather today, so I do wonder if it would be less screechy in a cooler temperature. I'll have to try it again on a colder day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2234040"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2234040#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2232345" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; What a lovely fragrance.  Love the honeysuckle smell lingering in the air and on my clothes.<br />
I wear other perfumes but keep coming back to this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2232345"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2232345#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229363" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229363" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="loulu03"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="loulu03" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229363ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229363" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2204142">loulu03</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 14:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>TLDR; Easy blind buy.<br />
<br />
Game-changer honestly. Very linear though in its smell - no depth to it but that's what's so lovely about it. I LOVE the green in it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2229363"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2229363#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2221249" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2221249" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="giuliatrapletti"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702904"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1702904.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="giuliatrapletti" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Lust-10806.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.10806.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lust"title="Lust"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2221249ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2221249" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1702904">giuliatrapletti</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-17">07/17/24 08:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this used to be one of my favourite perfumes when I didn't have a collection and just wanted to smell good. <br />
and to be honest, I still like it. it's not something special, but it is feminine and classy. I probably would not repurchase it again, but I understand its appeal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2221249"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2221249#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2220044" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2220044" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Abeer Alatrash"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134624"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2134624.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Abeer Alatrash" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2220044ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2220044" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134624">Abeer Alatrash</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-16">07/16/24 05:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Good option of Jasmine,Tuberose or Jasminum sambac lovers, however you can buy this perfume blind buy. If you love CK beauty perfume you will love this perfume it have the same DNA. <br />
<br />
Flory, Clean fresh Calm fragrance, It's suitable to wear it in summer season rather winter and any time during the day. It lasts along.<br />
<br />
خيار جيد لعشاق الياسمين أو مسك الروم أو ورد الفلّ، ومع ذلك يمكنك شراء هذا العطر بشكل أعمى. إذا كنت تحب "CK beauty"، فسوف تحب هذا العطر لأنه يحمل نفس الحمض النووي.<br />
<br />
زهري، عطر نظيف ومنعش وهادئ، مناسب لارتداؤه في فصل الصيف أكثر من الشتاء وفي أي وقت خلال النهار. ثباته جيد وطويل.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2220044"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2220044#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2219177" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2219177" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nyagaitau"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191269"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2191269.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nyagaitau" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/La-Vie-Est-Belle-14982.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14982.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Vie Est Belle"title="La Vie Est Belle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2219177ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2219177" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191269">Nyagaitau</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-15">07/15/24 08:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didn't like this fragrance at first, I wore it when it was so hot in Kenya, but with time it has become one of my top 3 scents that I reach for. It's classy, fresh floral and makes me smell like an elegant lady. The dry down gets even better as it is not as sharp. It's not a safe blind buy though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2219177"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2219177#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2210189" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2210189" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bethanyag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457804"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1457804.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bethanyag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2210189ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2210189" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457804">bethanyag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-06">07/06/24 13:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of my favorites and one of my most worn perfumes. I can understand how some people don’t appreciate it, as tuberose seems to be one of those notes you love or hate, and this is certainly a strong tuberose scent. But I love it. To me, Bloom smells classy and sophisticated, timeless yet modern. There’s something incredibly luxurious and posh to me about tuberose perfumes when they’re done right. This is also one of my most high-performing perfumes, as other people can smell it on me, I can certainly smell it on myself for hours, and it lasts a long time. This is a perfect springtime scent, but I wear it all year. I find that I like Bloom more and more the longer I have it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2210189"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2210189#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2206168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2206168" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mlrd217"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1123982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1123982.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mlrd217" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Honour-Woman-12762.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12762.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Honour Woman"title="Honour Woman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2206168ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2206168" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1123982">mlrd217</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-02">07/02/24 13:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the most realistic tuberose perfume, like some reviewer had said. <br />
You have to like fresh tuberose to like this. Pure tuberose bouquet, it can be sharp for some people.<br />
On my search of tuberose perfume, I tried Do Son by Dyptique and Gucci Bloom side by side, they smell identical, Bloom is slightly stronger, so I picked Bloom. It doesn't smell bubble gummy like Fracas or Mancera Velvet Vanilla.<br />
It is not a complex perfume, but I love this. Bloom is very elegant, simple yet beautiful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2206168"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2206168#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197451" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2197451" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NadiasmellsGorgeous"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1955915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NadiasmellsGorgeous" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2197451ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2197451" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1955915">NadiasmellsGorgeous</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 15:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love tuberose and Jasmin, but find some of those white floral perfumes indolic. Gucci bloom does smell more mature, but in a wealthy woman kind of way. I live in Hawaii, so it smells like wearing a fresh tuberose lei around your neck all day. <br />
 I love to wear it in the spring/summer because the Rangoon keeps it a little more fresh. It’s a great everyday, in offensive perfume. This is a signature worthy scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2197451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2197451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2197398" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
