padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1266753">Josesalinas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-23">06/23/24 06:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bubble gummy Tuberose that goes into an unmistakable Amarige by Givenchy, that’s the matronly a lot of folks mentioned on here I think.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2197022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2197022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194517" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2194517" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WinterSneeuw"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183748"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1183748.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WinterSneeuw" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Black-Opium-Intense-52924.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52924.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Opium Intense"title="Black Opium Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2194517ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2194517" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1183748">WinterSneeuw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-20">06/20/24 15:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Today (June 20th, which also happends to be the Summer Solstice) I finished my 4th fragrance in 2024: Gucci Bloom. I bought a 100ml bottle in the fall of 2017, after smelling it first in the Summer. I then asked the salesperson wheter Gucci Bloom or Mugler Aura would suit better for an office, since I worked my first real job at the time and wanted to give myself a treat. The salesperson said Gucci Bloom was better, I ended up buying Aura because Aura intrested me more. I could however not forget Gucci Bloom: its powdery, almost medicinal smell and the stunning water nymph/Ophelia like commercial with Dakota Johnson that I rember seeing all the time on TV. So I went back and bought the biggest bottle they had.<br />
<br />
Ever time I smell this fragrance, I feel comforted and mature. Like the well put together woman I want to be. I bought this fragrance when I was 21 and at first I wore it everytime I felt not taken seriously or when I had big life or career events. I wore this for example when I signed the pages to buy the house that I was lucky enough to buy in 2021.<br />
<br />
In 2021, I started to wear my 8 oldest fragrance bottles suited for every season as a rotation. Gucci Bloom became a staple in my Spring and Summer rotation. This fragrance is beautifull and etheral in the warmer weather and to me it signals good times to come.<br />
<br />
The opening starts of with a strange mix of powdery and green, which if sprayed too much can be very medicinal. This is very brief, because soon all the white florals pop up with the main act being tuberose. It stays pretty linear the whole time and I get a solid work day/ 8ish hours when wearing it.<br />
<br />
I feel like letting go of an old friend with the bottle being finished, but I am happy with my big collection to finish bottles.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2194517"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2194517#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192998" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192998" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sanguine_scenttrails"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1831365"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1831365.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sanguine_scenttrails" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-704.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.704.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel"title="Angel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192998ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192998" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1831365">Sanguine_scenttrails</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 08:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Massive blossoms of humid, photorealistic tuberose and jasmine radiating from the tropic heat, hanging down from damp bitter green branches. If ever there was a scent so aptly named, Bloom is it. This performs beautifully. On hot days Bloom warms up on the skin and surrounds you in an heady aura as if the climate around you shifts- all without feeling too heavy or cloying. It is enchanting. It is timeless. It is a signature scent.<br />
<br />
I wore the heck out of my bottle when it released, and took a long break away from this fragrance for a few years until just recently. I found a sample vial of the yellow Profumo Di Fiori flanker in my nightstand, and I needed Bloom back in my life immediately. Profumo is excellent, masterful even, but my true love is the original EDP... One of my top favorite frags of all time. In an olfactive landscape oversaturated with gourmands, saccharine florals, and sweet musks, I return to a favorite that possesses none of these trendy qualities. Wearing Gucci Bloom once more, I am home again.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2192998"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2192998#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2190588" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2190588" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sokoldinhere"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2166014"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sokoldinhere" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Paradoxe-75668.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75668.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Paradoxe"title="Prada Paradoxe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2190588ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2190588" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2166014">Sokoldinhere</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-17">06/17/24 01:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I want to like this perfume so much, as I am a huge fan of white floral scents. However, there is a certain bitterness that lingers beneath the strong jasmine smell that I just can't shake off and it turns me away. That same bitterness also makes this white floral fragrance heavier than it should be, becoming overbearing in warmer and humid weather. I do appreciate the staying power of this perfume, however; I can still smell it on me 12 hours after applying it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2190588"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2190588#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2190362" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2190362" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="persimmonism"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1545348.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="persimmonism" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-Profumo-Di-Fiori-62281.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62281.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gucci Bloom Profumo Di Fiori"title="Gucci Bloom Profumo Di Fiori"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2190362ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2190362" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545348">persimmonism</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-16">06/16/24 17:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Light, airy bouquet of white flowers. Safe, pleasant. That light pink is the perfect color for it: powdery, and don't know why but I get a tinge of an emergent pastel rose from the whole concoction..?<br />
It kicks off in the perfect direction, and then.. nothing.. I think the Bloom accord sets a gorgeous stage, but that stage needs something performing upon it.<br />
(The yellow bottle's ylang does it for me.)<br />
<br />
As it dries down, it gets warmer. Very nice. But. This whole darned line has zero staying power.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2190362"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2190362#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185755" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185755" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185755ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185755" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079916">Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-12">06/12/24 05:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I usually like perfume with tuberose in it. I think the rangoon creeper makes it smells a little weird. It smells old lady. A little disappointed with the smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2185755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2185755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2185259" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2185259" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SongKi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152735"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2152735.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SongKi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/H24-Herbes-Vives-89146.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89146.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="H24 Herbes Vives"title="H24 Herbes Vives"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2185259ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2185259" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152735">SongKi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 15:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I impulsively blind bought many years ago and didn't like it. I had forgotten about it in the back of my collection for a few years, but I do like it a lot now. I remembered it being very strong and headache inducing. It performs quite well, lasting on me for many hours. Tuberose is all I can smell. It's also sweet, in a way, very round and flowery. I prefer to wear this at night in the summer, it feels too heavy for the day. This is not for the weak of nose; if you like strong tuberose scents then this is your safest blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2185259"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2185259#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179610" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179610" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lykopa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492443"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1492443.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lykopa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Floral-Street/Sunflower-Pop-68667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sunflower Pop"title="Sunflower Pop"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179610ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179610" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1492443">Lykopa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 23:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely gorgeous white florals. Someone close to me wears this and it is just the most natural, elegant smell. She always smells put together and fresh. A white floral bomb, but undoubtedly classy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2179610"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2179610#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2178908" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2178908" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="YourFragranceFriend"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619170"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1619170.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="YourFragranceFriend" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2178908ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2178908" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619170">YourFragranceFriend</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 10:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with fresh airy jasmine and sweet tuberose. The jasmine is the bouquet fresh type with green facets. The tuberose is bubblegumy but not overly so. <br />
<br />
It smells like the type of fragrance my mom would wear. She loves beachy yet clean white florals. This is less beachy yet still has the type of floral I associate with her.<br />
<br />
As it wears, I get more of the sweet tuberose. Bloom stays rather linear once the tuberose comes out. I think if you like Armani My Way, you will enjoy this because of the similarities. One major difference is that Bloom stays calm and mellow while My Way is punchy and bright. <br />
<br />
This fragrance is pleasant but not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2178908"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2178908#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177364" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2177364" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="exquisitecrops"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264111"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1264111.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="exquisitecrops" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2177364ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2177364" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1264111">exquisitecrops</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-04">06/04/24 01:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I remember when Gucci Bloom was released.<br />
<br />
I was shocked by how natural-smelling, wearable it was. It smells way more expensive than the price point was. The whole thing just screams great judgement. It was refreshing because for a while everything released either smells like molten sugar or half-washed laundry.<br />
<br />
It's a creamy tuberose, a bit waxy and creamy, counterbalanced with a green, bordering astringent jasmine. The base is a nice woody musk. Just nice and very pretty.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2177364"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2177364#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2177357" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2177357" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tunteitajatuoksuja"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2155510"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tunteitajatuoksuja" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2177357ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2177357" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2155510">Tunteitajatuoksuja</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-04">06/04/24 01:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was using a sample of this during which two dates praised how good I smelled. One of them even sent me a picture of himself smelling the pillow the day after I'd leaned on it during our date. So naturally, even though I hadn't had such strong feelings about it before, I had to buy it. <br />
<br />
And now...I love it. Someone wrote that it's like hugging a put together mum...maybe that's why those dates liked it? :D But for me it's an answer to a need I didn't know I had. I think it's elegant and timeless, yet fresh. I won't comment on the notes, since other people have already done it better than I could ever express myself. <br />
<br />
It warms up on my skin so beautifully. I keep smelling my wrists when I have it on. Only downside is, the longevity isn't that great on my skin. If I want it to last a bit longer, I use the old trick of spraying it in the air and walking through it, in addition to putting it on wrists and neck.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2177357"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2177357#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2169936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2169936" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="doeseer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1921565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1921565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="doeseer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Obsession-for-Men-249.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.249.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Obsession for Men"title="Obsession for Men"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2169936ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2169936" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1921565">doeseer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-28">05/28/24 01:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don't particularly enjoy white florals but this was my signature scent for a long while (bought 5 big bottles). It just has something addicting in it. Hugs from the put together mom friend vibe. Inoffensive, simple, fresh, clean, timeless. On me the sillage was borderline scary, people knew I was in because I left a lingering trail - I do tend to spray myself a lot though. I am a bit scared to get another bottle after so long but if I ever do I'll leave an update.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2169936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2169936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2169101" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Balanced notes of tuberose and jasmine, proper for all seasons with sensible sillage and longevity. Everything I want from a perfume is here! Happy to wear it😍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2169101"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2169101#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2167253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2167253" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="paupadua"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1355815"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1355815.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="paupadua" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chloe/Love-Story-Eau-Sensuelle-42130.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42130.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Story Eau Sensuelle"title="Love Story Eau Sensuelle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2167253ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2167253" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1355815">paupadua</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-25">05/25/24 03:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am fan of tuberose as well as jasmin, and this is a beautiful, womanly white floral scent that is fresh and fragrant like holding a bouquet of white florals. It smells almost the same as DoSon Diptyque except for its muskiness.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2167253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2167253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2166758" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2166758" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aquapinkmoon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1809463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aquapinkmoon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/My-Burberry-Blush-45820.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45820.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="My Burberry Blush"title="My Burberry Blush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2166758ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2166758" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809463">Aquapinkmoon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-24">05/24/24 13:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you want to smells like fresh cut white flowers this is perfect. I received a bottle of Gucci bloom as a gift a few years ago and this will always ba a staple in my collection. Perfect for day time, date night or upscale occasions, absolutely gorgeous and timeless, so feminine and as I’m in my early 20’s I believe this is youthful too. Once again, this smells like flowers and I love it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2166758"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2166758#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2163960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2163960" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="noctivagantlibertine"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1920062"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1920062.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="noctivagantlibertine" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Victoria-s-Secret/Bombshell-Escape-91516.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91516.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bombshell Escape"title="Bombshell Escape"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2163960ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2163960" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1920062">noctivagantlibertine</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-22">05/22/24 04:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A lovely classic, a clean and realistic honeysuckle well blended with jasmine and tuberose. Very little projection on me and doesn't last that long. I don't find it strong or baby-powdery, just like fresh cut stems. It reminds me a little bit of walking in a botanical garden.<br />
<br />
Would be nice to layer with some post-bath sesame oil for a nice cozy 90's vibe. For men in particular, this might be nice to blend with something spice-forward, it's more girly at first but settles into a more unisex floral, IMO.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2163960"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2163960#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2162359" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2162359" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="msmoleskin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1495657.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="msmoleskin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Filippo-Sorcinelli/Opus-1144-29992.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.29992.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Opus 1144"title="Opus 1144"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2162359ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2162359" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1495657">msmoleskin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-20">05/20/24 14:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the opening of Gucci Bloom is the most perfect honeysuckle-jasmine i’ve ever smelled. and once the creamy bubblegum tuberose kicks in, i feel like i’m drunk on white flowers. i’m having flashbacks to my East-Texas childhood, shoving my face into star jasmine, gardenia, and honeysuckle. it’s so strong at first you can definitely taste it, but i’m not even mad about that. all the warmth, none of the funk. rangoon creeper is also known as “Chinese honeysuckle,” and i can see why.<br />
<br />
as strong as it starts, though, it has slightly poor performance overall, going out in a blaze of glory rather quickly, but leaving a sweet, dark, powdery trail behind. (i wonder if layering this with Not a Perfume would make it stick around longer.)<br />
<br />
EDIT 5/31/24: tried this with NaP and, while not sure it improved the performance, it filled in the spaces, boosted the powdery musk at the end, and made it more interesting overall — and did not alter the glorious opening in the least. win-win.<br />
<br />
/current edp</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2162359"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2162359#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2158630" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2158630" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="baka.tenshi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1304602"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1304602.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="baka.tenshi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bath-Body-Works/Fairytale-77501.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77501.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fairytale"title="Fairytale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2158630ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2158630" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2158630"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2158630#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2155306" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2155306" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ps371213"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1449439"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1449439.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ps371213" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Devotion-84951.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84951.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Devotion"title="Devotion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2155306ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2155306" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1449439">ps371213</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-14">05/14/24 01:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>an amazing floral perfume, which develops to be a bit powdery. i love this combo, it used to be my signature fragrance for a few years until i switched to gucci guilty. <br />
<br />
thus it develops and wears really well on the skin, and even the performance is very good. moderate sillage. even though it has tuberose, for me it doesn’t have the distinct old lady smell, rather it just smells very sophisticated, and can be worn just as well by those under 70 years.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2155306"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2155306#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2146216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1220622">faunwand</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 03:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's excessively floral, as if white flower petals are piercing your nostrils, yet oddly appealing. It consistently evokes the image of a mature Italian woman residing in a quaint village adorned with expansive gardens. Overall, it's a timeless, beautiful fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2146216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2146216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143146" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2025012">SouthLondonFox</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-02">05/02/24 05:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have a bottle of this I was gifted and never wear as simple white florals just aren't my thing at all. Today I decided to try layering it with Fields at Nightfall (Zara This Is Her dupe) and it works so well.<br />
<br />
It's very floral still, but with a bit of sweetness and warmth that makes it far more wearable for me. I can't stop sniffing my arm.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2143146"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2143146#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2136121" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is a must for lovers of white flowers. It's like diving head first into a pool of flowers. Reminds me of summer mornings walking through a field.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2136121"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2136121#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2135505" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2135505" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jordan 99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1647482"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1647482.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jordan 99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2135505ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2135505" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1647482">Jordan 99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-24">04/24/24 20:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is tuberose bomb, very strong. I love it, but can’t wear strong perfumes because of my husband’s snowflake-ish nose. Drydown is soapy jasmine with tuberose. It’s similar gender as May Way, but this one is maybe bit more mature and elegant.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2135505"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2135505#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2132079" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="paper.smile"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1568512"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1568512.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="paper.smile" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gioia-8442.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8442.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gioia"title="Acqua di Gioia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2132079ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2132079" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1568512">paper.smile</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-21">04/21/24 20:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I smelled it in a store and was I was immediatly brought back to that Flower perfume by Avon that I used to love so very much when I was a tween, but obviously more luxurious. Gucci Bloom, I feel, is a bit mature for me, but it's quite classy and suitable for formal ocassions. I wouldn't wear it on a casual date with friends, or a date to the movie teather. It feels quite expansive on my skin, like all of me smells of the sweet tuberose and jazmin, walking through a flowery garden on spring. I really do love it, I just feel it a bit grown up-er than I currently am. Maybe when I'm 35 it will fit me like a glove.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2132079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2132079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2129956" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VirgowithLeo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408961"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408961.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="VirgowithLeo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2129956ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2129956" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408961">VirgowithLeo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-19">04/19/24 17:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like 95% similar to Jovan Island Gardenia<br />
Walmart perfume you can buy from Amazon</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2129956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2129956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128266" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2128266" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="onemoreloser"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1537692"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1537692.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="onemoreloser" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mercedes-Benz/Mercedes-Benz-Club-Black-46797.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46797.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mercedes Benz Club Black"title="Mercedes Benz Club Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2128266ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2128266" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1537692">onemoreloser</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-18">04/18/24 05:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very clean, mature, floral fragrance. Much too strong for my nose, like a slap of flowers to the face. I never detected anything other than floral notes - it is just pure tuberose. Barely any jasmine. If that's your vibe and you're certain you love tuberose, go for it! Not for me though. I gave it to my auntie.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2128266"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2128266#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126690" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126690" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="briarrose33"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042653"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2042653.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="briarrose33" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126690ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126690" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2042653">briarrose33</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-16">04/16/24 14:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Clean, fresh, simple — will always remind me of 2017 when I fell in love with the ad campaign (sorry!) and then the scent as soon as I tried it. Beautiful bottle. I finished my first bottle years ago and recently picked up another, and it seems weaker to me now and doesn’t last anywhere near as long as I remember, so is a skin scent for me after about an hour of wear. I’d probably recommend the red Ambrosia di Fiori one in the line over the original now, which is a shame.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2126690"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2126690#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120255" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2120255" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JasminePetal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294619"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="JasminePetal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2120255ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2120255" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.89); But it's a bit too simple and one-sided in my opinion. There's nothing in particular wrong with it, but it just doesn't stand out at all. I wish there were some more interesting notes to balance it out and give it a bit more flesh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="2120255"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=2120255#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118851" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
