padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1751921" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="greenmelon20"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677988"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1677988.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="greenmelon20" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/Olympea-31666.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31666.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Olympéa"title="Olympéa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1751921ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1751921" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677988">greenmelon20</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-04">02/04/23 14:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am in the process of testing this perfume, and while I love floral scents, this is a bit too strong for me. The jasmine and tuberose overpower your nose like no other and reminds me of a more mature woman, perhaps in her late 30s to 40s, since it is more of a straight forward floral and doesn't have any fruit/sweet notes. However, there is nothing bad about this; maybe when I am older, I will purchase a bottle since I enjoy a good green floral perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="1751921"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=1751921#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1748778" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1748778" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aknisak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646772"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1646772.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aknisak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1748778ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1748778" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646772">Aknisak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-01">02/01/23 02:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like tuberose and jasmine. Yet I do not like this perfume. <br />
Maybe the combo is not working for me.<br />
It has that very heavy floral. Nothing more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="1748778"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=1748778#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1748347" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1748347" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ambervxyjul"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598318"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1598318.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ambervxyjul" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1748347ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1748347" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1598318">ambervxyjul</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-31">01/31/23 11:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my all time favorite scents. First smelled this when I was 17 years old and fell in love immediately. Ironically, I’m not a big fan of green scents with rose or too much floral. But this for some reason smells so elegant and uplifting that I can’t pin point exactly what I am smelling. I do get the jasmine note and a creamy fresh scent. It’s very strong and projection can give others headaches! A lot of people say this is very mature and out dated, lol I don’t think this is an outdated perfume in any way. Not everyone wants to smell like sugar coated raspberry’s and lemon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="1748347"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=1748347#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1744344" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1744344" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alinadaisy05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1641449"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1641449.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alinadaisy05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1744344ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1744344" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1641449">alinadaisy05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-26">01/26/23 13:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A lot of people think this is a basic, boring floral scent. If you’re not into florals, obviously you wouldn’t like it, but I think it’s very classy and clean spring scent. It is very simple, but I still think it’s nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="1744344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=1744344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1740804" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1740804" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="East River Pearl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560862"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1560862.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="East River Pearl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1740804ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1740804" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1560862">East River Pearl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-22">01/22/23 15:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A strong, linear jasmine. An indolic white floral that dries down ever so slightly powdery.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="1740804"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=1740804#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="44894" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1071691" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1071691" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jackiex"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1127580"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1127580.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jackiex" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1071691ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1071691" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1127580">Jackiex</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-06-20">06/20/19 07:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A beautiful scent.<br />
Gucci Bloom smells like my wedding day. The white flowers in my bouquet, a cool summer afternoon, when the air is fresh just after rain. Feeling so vulnerable on the way to the church and wishing my late mother could have been there with me. But how beautifully everything turned up in the end, on one of the happiest days of my life.<br />
Starts green, turns into gentle, cool white floral. Longevity and sillage are good.<br />
Tears of sadness and tears of joy. Sunshine through the rain. I will cherish this scent forever!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="1071691"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=1071691#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent888096" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc888096" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="iamoir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029316"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1029316.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="iamoir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gres/Cabotine-1061.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1061.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cabotine"title="Cabotine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma888096ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck8x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd888096" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029316">iamoir</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-08">12/08/17 07:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my...<br />
Gucci Bloom smells flawless. Timeless, beautiful floral. So what if there are similar floral perfumes in the market...look at all the sweet gourmands and their endless cheap clones. This on the other hand is a high quality very intense white floral.<br />
<br />
It's such a balanced blend of tuberose, jasmine and honeysuckle, all united into one scent but at the same time you can definitely identify all of them separately. High pitched jasmine and the orris root adds a dusty powdered vintage feel. Bubblegum vibes, plummy, grapey and honeyed floral. With a green kick. <br />
<br />
To some it will seem linear and lacking notes, but really on skin it has enough facets so it doesn't end up boring and at the same time it is very happy to layer with other perfumes, trust me. <br />
<br />
Smells polished, groomed and powdered too. Not old-lady and neither teenybopper; this is the perfume for a young woman who wants to smell beautifully and stand out. Gucci Bloom is not overpowering but at the same time it does not go unnoticed either.<br />
<br />
Gucci Bloom and Twilly Hermes really stand out as new releases of 2017. Don't bother with the so called four-centric-white floral-young Gabrielle myth that Chanel is promoting, it's brainwashing: all they have done is a plain citrus floral shampoo juice and a huuuuuge advertising-mega-story-campaign to back it up. If you want the straight up white floral of the 2017 it's Bloom. If you want the youthfulness with a spice of 2017 that's Twilly. <br />
<br />
Truly an unexpected release. But we are so so happy with it. Well done Gucci, keep it up like that!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="888096"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=888096#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent861977" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc861977" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="chakalitpasshun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/917351"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.917351.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="chakalitpasshun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Devotion-84951.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84951.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Devotion"title="Devotion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma861977ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd861977" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/917351">chakalitpasshun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-09-17">09/17/17 07:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Now, I usually don't do white florals, but this is white florals done RIGHT! I had no intentions of liking this, because Gucci fragrances rarely do it for me. For the people who say it smells " too florally" I mean, Its called BLOOM for God sake lol. But it is not at all in your face. It simply IS. I love how it is such a true, classic floral and they contrasted the packaging to be so modern and chic. Very well done.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="861977"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=861977#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent849798" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc849798" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lagesto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078100"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1078100.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lagesto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma849798ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd849798" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1078100">Lagesto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-08-10">08/10/17 10:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Chic, chic, chic!! Bloom totally captivates me! A girl told me it's like a wedding. I feel it's like when you pour water into thirsty flowers and they suddenly bloom and start sending seductive aromas! It's like if you are the flower it self.  It's intensive thought not overwhelming. Rich but light.  Very delicate on skin. Totally exotic! I just miss a better longevity. Sillage is very high in the first hour and then it stars getting more and more discrete. I recommend it for someone who like white florals and wants to impress.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="849798"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=849798#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent880887" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc880887" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="butterflybeauty"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1084621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1084621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="butterflybeauty" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Devotion-84951.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84951.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Devotion"title="Devotion"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma880887ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd880887" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1084621">butterflybeauty</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-11-16">11/16/17 01:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh wow how I love this perfume.  If you love the true scent of real Tuberose and Jasmine flowers, you will find that smell here.  It is the most perfect natural version of these exceptional blooms.  I tested this scent with the real flowers and it captures them perfectly! <br />
<br />
I am tired of perfumes that say they have jasmine and tuberose and you can barely detect those flowers. <br />
<br />
I have had other tuberose with jasmine scents that were beautiful, but this is the best version yet. It captures the highest quality of those flowers that I have ever smelled. It invokes the pure delight of those flowers so well, without the too dominant powder element that often accompanies perfumes with tuberose and jasmine.<br />
<br />
This perfume also has a gentle hint of Rangoon creeper with its beautiful unique flowers and a very light hint of musk and woods, but these elements are only softly in the background to round out the fragrance. <br />
 <br />
This perfume is vibrant yet simple, full of character yet classic.  The perfume itself has very quickly climbed into the top of my favorite perfumes. I predict that this one will stand the test of time and I will always keep a bottle. <br />
<br />
The box is absolutely gorgeous and is very artistic.  It's the first box that I would even keep out just to look at it. At first I wasn't sure about the bottle because it looked plastic in the pictures, but it is actually high quality and it feels ceramic.  The spray mechanism is of a much higher quality than most perfumes- you can really control how much you spray. The movie is gorgeous- showing how nature and flowers can set us free. The advertising inspires us to embrace the feminine. This perfume is wild, natural and sensual.<br />
<br />
This scent makes me feel so good when I wear it.  I get a lot of compliments on it as well. It really stands out from other perfumes and is distinctly different from what is commonly worn currently. It puts so many other perfumes to shame. It is of superior quality.<br />
<br />
Well done Gucci! This is your best perfume yet!  Thank you, thank you, thank you for giving us authentic Tuberose and Jasmine! I have been seriously missing Bloom in my perfume wardrobe!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="880887"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=880887#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="44894" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>

</div>

    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent962433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc962433" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Michelle12345678"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1014935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Michelle12345678" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Gold-70015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gold +"title="Gold +"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma962433ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd962433" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1014935">Michelle12345678</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2018-07-16">07/16/18 14:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Straightforward white floral. Tuberose is dominant. Then jasmine and honeysuckle. It's not indolic or animalic. It is calm (for a tuberose scent) and feminine. I hate white florals, but I can see why a lot of people love this. It's a 'safe' tuberose.<br />
<br />
You could wear this year-round. I feel like it plays well in any temperature. In winter the white florals will cut through the cold, in summer the white florals will radiate, and of course it will be perfect in autumn and spring. You really can't go wrong with this - you can wear it casually or formally, and it is office-safe because it is not as loud as typical tuberose fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="962433"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=962433#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent875276" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc875276" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jelenaeva"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1017899"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1017899.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jelenaeva" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sylvaine-Delacourte/Vanori-49614.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49614.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanori"title="Vanori"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma875276ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd875276" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1017899">jelenaeva</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-29">10/29/17 05:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>just another generic white floral with totally faceless tuberose whose life has been sucked out, with the intention to appeal to millenials or is it gen z - it's not inside what counts, but beautiful bottle that will sit so well on your dressing table next to all your gucci paraphernalia. meh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="875276"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=875276#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent872900" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc872900" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SailorV"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/955817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.955817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SailorV" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma872900ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd872900" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/955817">SailorV</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-21">10/21/17 11:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I thought I would like Bloom when I read some of the reviews, but sadly, I don't. I imagined a creamy dreamy hypnotic white floral, but this is more of an clean scent. <br />
I get no gorgeous buttery tuberose here. I get old school jasmine and soapy gardenia. It's slightly sour and misses warmth, feels kind of scratchy to my nose. The developement isn't huge, but after some time it gets a little softer at least, with some creamy light tuberose notes and powdery orris. Still it's somewhat harsh to my nose, and also boring. Gucci Bloom reminds me of some product from a no name floral gift set with soap, shower gel, body lotion etc. you could buy at a department store. You know, those sets that are not really expensive, but a bit overpriced for the regular body care products they are. The ones with the weird shiny textured bath gels. So it's just soapy and meh. <br />
I don't think I'd even dislike to smell this on others, maybe it even suits someone elses skin better. But on me I don't think it's good or original. Tuberose can do better than this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="872900"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=872900#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1034961" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1034961" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="waskotransportation"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1145607"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1145607.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="waskotransportation" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Elizabeth-Arden/Sunflowers-1701.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1701.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sunflowers"title="Sunflowers"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1034961ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1034961" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1145607">waskotransportation</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2019-02-24">02/24/19 16:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am a perfume addict and am constantly blind buying bottles based on reviews of others (bc I live in a remote town with literally no shopping).  I have collected over 300 beautiful perfumes.  This is incredibly boring.  I cannot believe there are so many great reviews.  There MUST be something wrong with my nose to think this is incredibly bland.<br />
<br />
I usually love many styles of perfume; fruity floral to rose oud and niche perfume.  This one, however, I do not at all understand the good reviews.  I try and try and keep hoping that one of these times smelling it, i will have a change of heart (which has happened before with other frags).  No luck.  <br />
<br />
In my opinion, this smells like the most basic generic boring perfume I can even imagine.  To my nose, there is nothing at all appealing about the scent, and I have smelled this a thousand times before... at Target or Walmart.  Gucci used to be so great, but now I do not love any of their newer releases.  They are all weak, boring, and nondescript.  This one takes the cake of boring.  I won't even wear this around the house because I would rather break out my celebrity frags for the day that smell so much better.<br />
<br />
After discovering how boring I think this one happens to be, I ordered a few more by Gucci, just to see if it was a fluke.  Gucci Envy, which was also highly rated, was better than this, but still boring and nondescript.  I ended up returning my bottle of Bamboo.  To my nose, this one was the best Gucci I have smelled...ever, but still not remarkable.  Not weak, has moderate sillage and also acceptable longevity.  Don't even mind having to reapply thru the day, as it was pretty inexpensive for what the juice smells like.  Even though I like Gucci II the best, I still don't ever reach for it.  I don't love it.  <br />
<br />
Just for some reference, my all-time favorite is Chloe.  Not the old Chloe, which is REAL gross, and I gave away the day I received it, but the newer version in the square/rectangle bottle.  Both EDP and EDT are so awesome that I could cry.  I wish there were more options for a soapy rose.<br />
<br />
I hope I didn't offend anyone as that is not my intention.  I just want to be as honest as I can be to hopefully stop a blind buyer with MY type of taste from wasting money.  Another house that seems pretty basic and boring, but I bought them all anyway, is Versace.  Maybe I am different than everyone else, but I am curious if there is anyone that feels the same way that I feel about the two houses.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="1034961"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=1034961#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent886713" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc886713" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="winikrose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/168287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.168287.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="winikrose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chance-Eau-Tendre-Eau-de-Parfum-52359.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52359.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Parfum"title="Chance Eau Tendre Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma886713ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd886713" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/168287">winikrose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-12-04">12/04/17 10:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Gucci Bloom is why I stop and smell the (new) perfumes lol...   Once in awhile there is a perfume of intoxicating beauty.  So happy I found this treasure.  There is nothing bright or clean or sparkling which is a change from my other loves. This is dusty soft and glamorous</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="44894"comment_id="886713"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Gucci/Gucci-Bloom-44894.html?ccid=886713#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="44894" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

                <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Brands</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Lattafa-Perfumes.html" class="en2inter">Lattafa Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">2.&nbsp;</span>

        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">49.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        </span>

    <script>

                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
